title: Quarterly Speaker Series
description: Candid discussions with senior leaders in government, defense, tech, and industry—built for actionable insights, not surface-level commentary.
bullets: Timely topics tied to mission outcomes

title: Bi-directional National Security Fellowship
description: Two-way placement between government and industry professionals to foster trust, share expertise, and align on mission-critical technology and policy.
bullets: Immersion in each other’s operating environments

title: Department of War National Security Fellowship
description: A veterans-focused pathway that pairs operational experience with executive leadership to tackle emerging security challenges.
